comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
This has been taken by Louise Rosskam, right? Along with this one:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2179178708]

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: We can't be sure, trialsanderrors, but it does seem possible.  I rechecked the negative card, and for this color image of children, the negative card states, "photographer unidentified."

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: This is of course purely speculative, but I just went through all the color photographs of the FSA-OWI collection and cannot find another photographer who took pictures under similar circumstances as Louise Rosskam's pictures from D.C. I'm not sure if the vicinity of the call number to the other Louise Rosskam pictures is another indicator, or if they were assigned retroactively.

comment._content: A sharp contrast to the impoverished farm children... these tykes are clearly well-to-do.
